project_abstract.cdata: In support of the Government's program to triple production of freshwater fish by the year 2000, the proposed project would expand and develop intensive pond culture in the vicinity of eight major urban centers. It would introduce into each project area an integated fisheries production, extension and marketing system operating on a fully commercial basis. The credit would provide equipment, vehicles, and support facilities, including 14 feed mills, 4 cold storage plants, 4 overwintering facilities, a hatchery, a vaccine factory and, 7 trade centers. Also the project would strengthen fisheries research and extension services through the provision of technical assistance and training and the construction and/or equipping of eight technical service centers. The technical assistance and training component would also be used to upgrade the qualifications of project staff to implement the proposed project and further fisheries development activities.

P003440.projectinfo: <![CDATA[<Project><LangCode>ZH</LangCode><ProjectName>淡水养鱼项目</ProjectName><ProjectAbstract>为支持中国政府实现到2000年淡水鱼产量增加两倍的目标，本项目将扩大八大城市附近地区的密集型池塘养鱼面积，并将为每个项目区引入完全商业化运行的综合性渔业生产、技术推广和营销系统。项目将资助设备、车辆和支持设施，包括14家饲料厂、4家冷冻厂、4处越冬设施、1个孵化场、一家疫苗厂以及7个交易中心。项目也将通过提供技术援助和培训、建设或装配8个技术服务中心，加强渔业研究和技术推广服务。技术援助和培训旨在提高项目工作人员素质和能力，以便实施本项目，进一步推动渔业发展活动。</ProjectAbstract></Project>]]>
